Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you in forming your Doing Business As (DBA) name and in registering a Copyright. We simplify the process for you by preparing and filing the DBA Statement with your respective state agency, as well as handling any publication requirements, if applicable, as well as conducting a Trademark Search and submitting the Trademark application to the US Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO) for registration.
For your reference, general information regarding establishing a DBA and Trademark registration has been outlined below. If you would like to get specific, detailed information on your personal situation, please contact a Business Formation Specialist at the phone number listed below. By speaking with a Specialist will be able to assist with answering further questions, as well as building a customized package to best benefit your needs.
DBAs are the simplest and least expensive way to establish a business name in order to operate a business as a sole proprietorship or partnership. A DBA will allow you to conduct business under the registered name, open a business bank account, enter into contracts, and hire employees.
Trademark registrations typically protect identifying marks used in commerce such as business or product names, slogans, short phrases, logos, and/or acronyms used to represent specific products and/or services. The federal Trademark registration protects you against an inferior product or service diminishing your reputation or profitability, and allows you to enforce against any infringement upon these rights.
